00144 int nfs_Readlink(  nfs_arg_t               * parg,
00145                    exportlist_t            * pexport,
00146                    fsal_op_context_t             * pcontext,
00147                    cache_inode_client_t    * pclient,
00148                    hash_table_t            * ht,
00149                    struct svc_req          * preq,
00150                    nfs_res_t               * pres ) 
00151 {
00152         static char     funcName[] = "nfs_Readlink";
00153   
00154         cache_entry_t         * pentry = NULL ;
00155   fsal_attrib_list_t      attr ;
00156   cache_inode_file_type_t filetype      ;
00157   cache_inode_status_t    cache_status         ; 
00158   int                     rc ;
00159   fsal_path_t             symlink_data ;
00160   char                  * ptr = NULL ;
00161   
00162         if (preq->rq_vers == NFS_V3)
00163         {
00164                 /* to avoid setting it on each error case */
00165                 pres->res_readlink3.READLINK3res_u.resfail.symlink_attributes.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00166         }
00167         /* Convert file handle into a vnode */
00168   if( ( pentry = nfs_FhandleToCache( preq->rq_vers, 
00169                                      &(parg->arg_readlink2),
00170                                      &(parg->arg_readlink3.symlink),
00171                                      NULL, 
00172                                      &(pres->res_readlink2.status),
00173                                      &(pres->res_readlink3.status),
00174                                      NULL, 
00175                                      &attr, 
00176                                      pcontext, 
00177                                      pclient, 
00178                                      ht, 
00179                                      &rc ) ) == NULL )
00180     {
00181       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00182       return rc ;
00183     }
00184 
00185   /* Extract the filetype */
00186   filetype = cache_inode_fsal_type_convert( attr.type ) ;
00187 
00188   /* Sanity Check: the pentry must be a link */
00189   if( filetype != SYMBOLIC_LINK )
00190     {
00191       switch (preq->rq_vers)
00192         {
00193         case NFS_V2:
00194           pres->res_readlink2.status = NFSERR_IO;
00195           break;
00196           
00197         case NFS_V3:
00198           pres->res_readlink3.status = NFS3ERR_INVAL;
00199         } /* switch */
00200       return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00201     } /* if */
00202 
00203   /* Perform readlink on the pentry */
00204   if( cache_inode_readlink( pentry, 
00205                             &symlink_data, 
00206                             ht, 
00207                             pclient, 
00208                             pcontext, 
00209                             &cache_status ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00210     {
00211       if( ( ptr = Mem_Alloc( FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN ) ) == NULL )
00212         {
00213           switch (preq->rq_vers)
00214             {
00215             case NFS_V2:
00216               pres->res_readlink2.status = NFSERR_NXIO;
00217               break;
00218               
00219             case NFS_V3:
00220               pres->res_readlink3.status = NFS3ERR_IO ;
00221             } /* switch */
00222           return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00223         }
00224 
00225       strcpy( ptr, symlink_data.path ) ;
00226       
00227       /* Reply to the client (think about Mem_Free data after use ) */
00228       switch (preq->rq_vers)
00229         {
00230         case NFS_V2:
00231           pres->res_readlink2.READLINK2res_u.data = ptr;
00232           pres->res_readlink2.status = NFS_OK;
00233           break;
00234 
00235         case NFS_V3:
00236           pres->res_readlink3.READLINK3res_u.resok.data = ptr;
00237           nfs_SetPostOpAttr( pcontext, pexport,
00238                              pentry, 
00239                              &attr,
00240                              &(pres->res_readlink3.READLINK3res_u.resok.symlink_attributes));
00241           pres->res_readlink3.status = NFS3_OK;
00242           break;
00243         }
00244       return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00245                 }
00246 
00247         /* If we are here, there was an error */
00248         if( nfs_RetryableError( cache_status ) )
00249     {
00250       return NFS_REQ_DROP ;
00251     }
00252   
00253         nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00254                        preq->rq_vers, 
00255                        cache_status,
00256                        &pres->res_readlink2.status,
00257                        &pres->res_readlink3.status,
00258                        pentry,
00259                        &(pres->res_readlink3.READLINK3res_u.resfail.symlink_attributes),
00260                        NULL, NULL, NULL,
00261                        NULL, NULL, NULL);
00262   
00263         return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00264 } /* nfs_Readlink */
00265 
00266 
00267 
00276 void nfs2_Readlink_Free(nfs_res_t * resp)
00277 {
00278   if (resp->res_readlink2.status == NFS_OK)
00279     Mem_Free(resp->res_readlink2.READLINK2res_u.data);
00280 } /* nfs2_Readlink_Free */
00281 
00290 void nfs3_Readlink_Free(nfs_res_t * resp)
00291 {
00292   if (resp->res_readlink3.status == NFS3_OK)
00293     Mem_Free(resp->res_readlink3.READLINK3res_u.resok.data);
00294 } /* nfs3_Readlink_Free */
